The Ministry of the Legislative Assembly of the Tver Region accepted the first visitors

29 January 2024, 16:48Society

On 29 January, the Legislative Assembly hosted the first tour of events in conjunction with the 30-year anniversary of the Regional Parliament. First photo exhibition - the retrospective activities of the Regional Parliament and the new interactive museum Members of past assemblies and veterans of the public service visited the Legislative Assembly.
